content.rendered:
Directed by Mangesh Hadawale.

Written by Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Mangesh Hadawale. K. Selvaraghavan.

Cast Meezaan Jafri(Shiva (as Meezaan)). Sharmin Segal(Astha). Chinmayee Surve(Vijaya More). Anil Gawas(Prabhakar More). Sonal Jha(Rajni Tripathi). Sanjay Gurbaxani(Umashankar Tripathi). Sameer Dharmadhikari(Sawant (as Samir Dharmadhikari)). Deepak Damle(Jhadav). Badri Chavan(Nandu (as Badriprasad Chavan)). Chetan Chitnis(Baban). Ishwak Singh(Aditya). Suyash Zunjurke(Fukrya (as Suyash Lata Zunjurke)). Sunil Tawde(Mr. Bhonsle (as Sunil Tavade)). Bharat Pahuja(Shivkumar). Komal Chhabria(Nirmala). Prachi Kadam(Sonu). Yash Bhojwani(Deepu). Tushar Ghadigaokar(Munna). Radha Sagar(Swati). Kiran Tambe(Jagya). Dinesh Sharma(Taxi Driver). Krishna Gokani(Reena). Hitesh Rawal(Motichand Shah). Ganpat Chavan(Old Man (Ganpat)). Shreyanshi Gabhawala(Sanaa). Anuj Sharma(Akash (Ashta’s Friend)). Aruj Shokeen(Sunny (Ashta’s Friend)). Abhilasha Patil(Rukmini). Omkar Chavan(Rukmini’s Husband). Aruna Singh(Ashta Lecturer (Female)). Sourabh Mukherjee(Studious Guy (Exam Scene)). Swaroop Khopkar(Mrs. Bhonsle). Somnath Tadwalkar(Sumo Driver). Ashutosh Pradhan(Society Singer). Dhananjay Sardeshpande(Announcer). Lokendra Rajawat(Inspector (Exam Scene)). Anil Bhanage(Businessman). Parameshwar(Supervisor Exam (Shiva)). Dinesh Rikame(Constable (Society)). Omni Thakker(Aditya’s Cheating Girl) . Cricknowle(Aniyo). Shreya Bhattacharya(Shreya (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Chetan Deolekar. Kiran Gangurde. Arvinder Gill. Arvinder Shagmer Gill. Mahaveer Jain. Chee Teng Joo. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Ranjana Sethi. Rohit Kumar Shah. Yogiraj Shetty. Vikram Yadav.

Production Bhansali Productions. T-Series.
